text: Rob Kane (April 30, 1967 February 5, 2021) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the Connecticut Senate, representing the 32nd district from 2009 to 2017. He was Connecticut state auditor from 2017 until his death in 2021. Kane was found dead in his home in Watertown, Connecticut on February 5, 2021, at age 53. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Rob Kane
